attributes.action: Restore freedom of movement in the EU from 01/01/2021
attributes.additional_details: Brexit voters did not vote to have UK national freedoms limited. The EU must respect our sovereign nation and allow full freedom of movement within the EU.
attributes.background: Ensure that British nationals retain full freedom of movement within the EU following the end of the Brexit withdrawal process.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556757
